message.raw:
Made class TriggerableDevice, which PseudoclockDevice is a subclass of
Its __init__ method looks at the parent, and if the parent is a Trigger,
uses it as self.trigger_device. Otherwise, it instantiates a Trigger with
the given parent and connection.

This change is so that Camera can have a trigger either passed in, or it can
instantiate one with a given parent, the same way the PulseBlaster does.

This is so that we can pass the same Trigger object into multiple cameras
to have them trigger simultanously
